display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PexSL-k6hxgQ7kNvwGom78P&_nc_oc=AdmrF3w_9FuNmPBcuHyHA2fCql7e-QuKHFbyPjhSvCKeiD4e19IdlzZtehHoOCG9p_CO1uKWwQkFGBTemUEQYELk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1wT-VzhRHDcywsWCy3vmVg&oh=00_AfHngsVTvSGrse_3TCTUm3qB9Egs9ITkc02PHDBC2IDekw&oe=68056C9D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=i_TDzA1IeBcQ7kNvwHYnid_&_nc_oc=Adlsi17Xa5Pu6C3MlQM0j6mKK12ajQf7djpwgKSy-f1bFmd_Ocy9skBTZ2ZPhRgszANSbBKLb4YZZDm3Ea3v42yn&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1wT-VzhRHDcywsWCy3vmVg&oh=00_AfEo2qElcH19Dzl0aObkdYRmoyJUNakcj8WpsafSjxUEeg&oe=68054E52)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
